actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to repeal section 5343(d) and make conforming amendments.

summary.text: Provides that, for the purpose of making a wage survey for determining the prevailing rate of pay in order to make adjustments in Federal employees' pay, the lead agency, designated by the Civil Service Commission, shall not be required to determine whether there exists in the local wage area a number of comparable positions in private industry sufficient to establish wage schedules and rates for the principal types of positions for which the survey is made. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5343).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to repeal section 5343(d) and make conforming amendments.
